summary: The story of the children who live in Bullerbyn, Sweden, through the spring and summer months.
cast: Linda Bergström|Crispin Dickson Wendenius|Henrik Larsson|Ellen Demérus|Anna Sahlin|Harald Lönnbro|Tove Edfeldt|Elisabeth Nordkvist|Ingwar Svensson|Catti Edfeldt|Bill Jönsson|Ann-Sofie Knape|Sören Petersson|Sigfrid Eriksson|Louise Ræder|Peter Dywik|Olof Sjögren|Ewa Carlsson|Lasse Ståhl|Willy Turesson|Eddie Axberg
title: Alla vi barn i Bullerbyn
